name: CyberForce Psychosis
description:
You're a cyborg runner, on their way to steal a powerfull relic that can generate military upgrades for enhanced humans. 

The police will surely take all measures necessary to stop you from leaving the city alive, 

but is'nt that another fun day of work?

Aim, shoot, dash, kill and survive long enough. Backup is on the way!

Maybe the relic could be of some use too? Sure could.
Bet you can manage the risks!

This game was made for the Juice Jam 2nd edition by yours truly : 
Jrevel, as Game Dev - https://jrevel.itch.io/
maevb, as Game Artist  - https://maevb.itch.io/
Akarius, as Sound Designer  - https://akarius.itch.io/

Stay cool, enjoy the runs!
